outline:
1. straight, upright, correct, right
    1. straight, level
    2. right, pleasing, correct
    3. straightforward, just, upright, fitting, proper
    4. uprightness, righteous, upright
    5. that which is upright (subst)
kjv_def: convenient, equity, Jasher, just, meet(-est), [phrase] pleased well right(-eous), straight, (most) upright(-ly, -ness).
